title: Which comeback by NCT 2020 do you prefer - Make A Wish or From Home? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bro make a wish fs…now they’re both amazing songs but make a wish…shotaro’s line just makes it that certified bop every NCTzen was looking for and you know i’m right. But like i said, they’re both really good and i couldn’t tell you how many times i’ve listened to them since the release. Now enjoy some wholesome memes.      Starts with 5…i get 20 upvotes, we go to 20 memes :)

make a wish. don’t get me wrong. i love from home but i’m not too much of a ballad person. from home is all vocals and it’s an amazing song. the members have stunning vocals and it’s such a beautiful song. but as a comeback, make a wish makes more of an impression on the audience. it has dancing, raps, vocals, so it’s a more comprehensive song imo.
